posts.post_content:
Posted By: Dave
Looking to fill out a T206 Portrait collection for reasonable prices... specifically Walter Johnson. Looking for a clear image SGC 40. I'm also looking for the following ports if you're looking to sell (all in 40's if possible). 

Beckley
Bender
Clarke
Chance (both versions)
Eddie Collins
Jimmy Collins
Evers
Jennings
Marquard
